snippet.title: KilaFlow | SAGE 2023 Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
KilaFlow is a fast paced precision platformer inspired by games such as Sonic Adventure 2, P-06, and Crash Bandicoot! 

Play as a little Antivirus cleaning up corrupted data in a bunch of wacky technology themed worlds (this demo only contains 1 world and some bonus SEGA inspired ones!)

Try the demo for free on the SAGE booth! https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/kilaflow-sage-2023-demo.1665/
